Title: Strange Bats
Description:
Hey. Her ladyship has a lead on some really strange bat that was flying around the Wormlands. 

The spies reported it behaving more like a person than a bat. We think we might have a druid out there, but it ain't revealin' itself to the nerubians on purpose.

You have one of those faces that make people hesitate before punching. Head out there and take a look.
RewardText: You! You are just what I need.
